summary: The implementation successfully delivers all 8 requirements. All sections are present with correct content and functionality. The backend stores contact form submissions. The design uses the specified black/orange/white color scheme with bold headings. The website is fully responsive. No missing requirements were identified, but several features were implemented beyond the specification.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links (Facebook, X/Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) in the footer
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists social media integration under non-goals, yet Footer.tsx implements social media icons and links

hallucinated_features.description: Contact information display (email, phone, location) in the Contact section
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 only specifies a contact form with Name, Email, and Message fields. The implementation adds contact information display with email, phone, and location address which was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: Quick Links navigation menu in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 only requires displaying the company name EVARON in the footer. The implementation adds a Quick Links section with navigation links which was not requested

hallucinated_features.description: Logo image and company description in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 specifies only the company name should be displayed. The footer includes the EVARON logo image and a descriptive tagline which exceeds the requirement

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: This external attribution with tracking parameters was not mentioned in any requirement and appears to be platform-specific branding added beyond the specification
